Packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```


Load Data
```{r}
X35020903 <- read_csv("https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/35020903")

X35020903

```


Wrangle Data
```{r}

edit_x35 <- X35020903 %>%
               filter(sex %in% "Female" | is.na(sex)) %>%
               filter(!(lineage %in% "unknown"))


```


Viz Data
```{r}

p <- ggplot(edit_x35) +
         aes(x = primary_disease, fill = lineage) +
         geom_bar() +
         scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
         coord_flip() +
         theme_minimal()

p

```

```{r}

ggplotly(p)

```
